name: WGJ196_StrangeRecipe - Kettle
description:
Super basic (and super late) entry for the WGJ, where we tried our hands on godot as complete beginners. Testing some basic player movement, inventory system, area collision, playing sounds, and all that.

Content wise you play as a little Witch's kettle. You collect ingredients to cook safely edible dishes.

Made by Coppery and Fyo~ 

May contain traces of magic and references
